briefTitle: Efficacy Study of Diathermy Cone Biopsy for the Treatment of Cervical Intraepithelial Lesion

armGroups.label: SWETZ
interventionNames: Procedure: Straight Wire Excision of Transformation Zone

armGroups.label: LLETZ cone
interventionNames: Procedure: Large Loop Excision of Transformation Zone (cone biopsy)

interventions.name: Straight Wire Excision of Transformation Zone
otherNames: NETZ - Needle Excision Of Transformation Zone

interventions.name: Large Loop Excision of Transformation Zone (cone biopsy)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Incompletely visible transformation zone in women with High grade Squamous Intraepithelial Lesion (HSIL)
* Suspicion of microinvasive carcinoma or occult invasive carcinoma
* Suspicion of glandular disease

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnancy
* Coagulation disorders
* Cervicitis were present
* Refusal to participate in the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Endocervical Margin Not Free of Disease.
outcomeMeasures.description: Primary outcome is the number of participants with incomplete excision of dysplasia at the endocervical excision margin as recognized histologically.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time Spent to Perform the Procedure
outcomeMeasures.description: Time was recorded from insertion until removal of the vaginal speculum.
